text: Reassemblage is a 1983 film by Trinh T. Minh-ha, shot in Senegal picturing the dwellings and everyday life of the Sereer people.Reassemblage, 1982 - Strictly Film School ==References== ==External links== *Reassemblage at IMDb Category:1983 films Category:Documentary films about the Serer people
title: Reassemblage (film)
